steamAccountName.description: The name or ID of the Steam account for which the App IDs should be fetched. Your account's game library must be set to public for the script to work. Check via this link: https://steamcommunity.com/id/accountName/games or this link: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/accountName/games while not logged in.

outputProperties.description: Which of the properties provided by the Steam API should be included in the resulting JSON object. Properties that are not available for an app will be omitted in the output.

appID.description: The App ID of the game.

logo.description: The URL to the game's logo.

storeLink.description: The URL to the game's store page.

statsLink.description: The URL to this users stats page for this game.

globalStatsLink.description: The URL to the global stats page for this game.
